breakdowns.description: Enables users to add new tasks with a title, description, priority, due date, and tag; edit existing tasks; delete tasks; and mark tasks as Completed or Pending.
conditions: A new task must include a title, description, priority, due date, and tag.

breakdowns.description: Enables users to add events with a name, description, and location; edit existing events; delete events; and mark events as archived.
conditions: A new event must include a name, description, and location.

breakdowns.description: Allows users to assign multiple tasks to an event.
conditions: Multiple tasks can be assigned to a single event.
